verses.verse: Elihu <S%H453><s%> also proceeded <S%H3254><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Allow <S%H3803><s%> me a little <S%H2191><s%>, and I will show <S%H2331><s%> you that I have yet to speak <S%H4405><s%> on God <S%H433><s%>'s behalf.
I will fetch <S%H5375><s%> my knowledge <S%H1843><s%> from afar <S%H7350><s%>, and will ascribe <S%H5414><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> to my Maker <S%H6466><s%>.
For truly <S%H551><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> shall not be false <S%H8267><s%>: he that is perfect <S%H8549><s%> in knowledge is with you <S%H1844><s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is mighty <S%H3524><s%>, and despises <S%H3988><s%> not any <S%H3524><s%>: he is mighty in strength <S%H3581><s%> and wisdom <S%H3820><s%>.
He preserves not the life <S%H2421><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: but gives <S%H5414><s%> right <S%H4941><s%> to the poor <S%H6041><s%>.

He withdraws <S%H1639><s%> not his eyes <S%H5869><s%> from the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: but with kings <S%H4428><s%> are they on the throne <S%H3678><s%>; Yes <S%H3427><s%>, he does establish them for ever <S%H5331><s%>, and they are exalted <S%H1361><s%>.
And if they be bound <S%H631><s%> in fetters <S%H2131><s%>, and be held <S%H3920><s%> in cords <S%H2256><s%> of affliction <S%H6040><s%>;
Then he shows <S%H5046><s%> them their work <S%H6467><s%>, and their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that they acted insolently <S%H1396><s%>.
He opens <S%H1540><s%> also their ear <S%H241><s%> to discipline <S%H4148><s%>, and commanded <S%H559><s%> that they return <S%H7725><s%> from iniquity <S%H205><s%>.
If they obey <S%H8085><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H3615><s%>, they shall spend their days <S%H3117><s%> in prosperity <S%H2896><s%>, and their years <S%H8141><s%> in pleasures <S%H5273><s%>.
But if they obey <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H5674><s%>, they shall perish by the sword <S%H7973><s%>, and they shall die <S%H1478><s%> without knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
But the hypocrites <S%H2611><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> heap up <S%H7760><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%>: they cry <S%H7768><s%> not when he binds them <S%H631><s%>.
They <S%H5315><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> in youth <S%H5290><s%>, and their life <S%H2416><s%> is among the unclean <S%H6945><s%>.
He delivers <S%H2502><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> in his affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and opens <S%H1540><s%> their ears <S%H241><s%> in oppression <S%H3906><s%>.

Even so would he have removed <S%H5496><s%> you out of the narrow <S%H6310><s%> into a broad place <S%H7338><s%>, where <S%H8478><s%> there is no restriction <S%H4164><s%>; and that which should be set <S%H5183><s%> on your table <S%H7979><s%> should be full <S%H4390><s%> of fatness <S%H1880><s%>.
But you have fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> the judgment <S%H1779><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: judgment <S%H1779><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> take hold on you <S%H8551><s%>.
Because there is wrath <S%H2534><s%>, beware lest he take you away <S%H5496><s%> with his stroke <S%H5607><s%>: then a great <S%H7230><s%> ransom <S%H3724><s%> cannot deliver you <S%H5186><s%>.
Will he esteem <S%H6186><s%> your riches <S%H7769><s%>? no <S%H1222><s%>, not gold, nor all the forces <S%H3981><s%> of strength <S%H3581><s%>.
Desire <S%H7602><s%> not the night <S%H3915><s%>, when people <S%H5971><s%> are cut off in their place <S%H5927><s%>.
Take care <S%H8104><s%>, regard <S%H6437><s%> not iniquity <S%H205><s%>: for this have you chosen <S%H977><s%> rather than affliction <S%H6040><s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God exalts <S%H7682><s%> by his power <S%H3581><s%>: who teaches like him <S%H3384><s%>?
Who has enjoined <S%H6485><s%> him his way <S%H1870><s%>? or who can say <S%H559><s%>, You have done <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>?
Remember <S%H2142><s%> that you magnify <S%H7679><s%> his work <S%H6467><s%>, which men <S%H582><s%> behold <S%H7891><s%>.
Every man <S%H120><s%> may see <S%H2372><s%> it <S%H582><s%>; man may behold <S%H5027><s%> it afar off <S%H7350><s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is great <S%H7689><s%>, and we know <S%H3045><s%> him not <S%H4557><s%>, neither can the number of his years <S%H8141><s%> be searched out <S%H2714><s%>.
For he makes small <S%H1639><s%> the drops <S%H5198><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>: they pour down <S%H2212><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> according to the vapor there <S%H108><s%>:
Which the clouds <S%H7834><s%> do drop <S%H5140><s%> and pour <S%H7491><s%> upon man <S%H120><s%> abundantly <S%H7227><s%>.
Also can any understand <S%H995><s%> the spreadings <S%H4666><s%> of the clouds <S%H5645><s%>, or the noise <S%H8663><s%> of his tabernacle <S%H5521><s%>?
Behold <S%H6566><s%>, he spreads his light <S%H216><s%> upon it <S%H3680><s%>, and covers the bottom <S%H8328><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.
For by them judges <S%H1777><s%> he the people <S%H5971><s%>; he gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H400><s%> in abundance <S%H4342><s%>.
With clouds <S%H3709><s%> he covers <S%H3680><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>; and commanded <S%H6680><s%> it not to shine by the cloud that comes between <S%H6293><s%>.
The noise <S%H7452><s%> there showed <S%H5046><s%> concerning it <S%H4735><s%>, the cattle also concerning the vapor <S%H5927><s%>.
